Title: 6B: An Anthology of Hawaii Films
Director: Jay Hanamura, Ryan Kawamoto, Roy Kimura, Nathan Kurosawa
Writer: Jay Hanamura, Roy Kimura, Nathan Kurosawa, Chris McKinney
Actors: Jim Aina, Natalie Albanese, Lv Alberto, Richard Arias
Plot: 6B is the anthology feature film of five Hawaii filmmakers. Each of the four stories revolve around rooms with the number 6B and the film examines the darker side of island life: a man ...
